name: Flappy Bird (itch) (Arpan Neupane)
description:
This is my recreation of the Flappy Bird Game.

This game is very simple to play. Your job is to not hit any of the green pipes. You will need to pass through the space in between the pipes. The more pipes you pass the higher your score will be. The higher your score the game will become harder. This is a pretty fun game to play. If you have any questions or comments email me at arpanneupane19@gmail.com.

HAVE FUN PLAYING!
